instruction: Provide a list of skills an engineer should possess.
output: Engineers should possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills. They need to be creative and have the ability to think outside the box. They must be able to communicate effectively, both verbally and written. They need to be able to work under pressure and manage their time efficiently. They must have knowledge of mathematics and sciences, as well as experience with computer assisted design software. They should also possess engineering design experience and take responsibility for their projects. Finally, engineers should maintain up-to-date knowledge on advances in engineering technology.
